screenshot.caption: Play the Jak and Daxter PlayStation 2 classics natively on your computer.
Need help? Just send a support package to the developers.

description.p: The OpenGOAL Launcher simplifies the installation process for the OpenGOAL project, allowing you to play the Jak and Daxter series with enhanced fidelity and quality of life improvements.

Whether you're revisiting these beloved titles or experiencing them for the first time, the OpenGOAL Launcher provides a convenient and efficient way to enjoy the adventures of Jak and Daxter. Legitimate copies of the original PS2 games are required.

Need assistance or want to contribute to the project? Download the Support Package for comprehensive help, or get involved in development to help shape the future of OpenGOAL. Visit our website for more information, explore the code, or connect with fellow enthusiasts on our Discord server.
